answers.answer: fever usually indicates infection maybe your bladder infection has gone to your kidney some of your syptoms sounds lke from infection let us know what you find out.  best wishes

question: First History as i know it. Breast Cancer survivor 10 years. The past year reaching Diabetes Mellitus. One week ago, Bladder infection,and fever of 101.4 treated with Tylenol and fluids. Today a week later, exausted tylenol,now using Advil and complaining about body aches, chest discomfort, fever still. Will go to emergency in the A.M.  My question is: could all of this be the side affects of Diabetes without treatment? Could fever mean infection of another sort?
title: Bladder infection/1wk  , Pre Diabetic, Cancer remission/10yr
